listener.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #!/usr/bin/env python3
2 '''Allows to listen and recognize speech'''
3 
4 import sys
5 
6 from coffebot.audio.recorder import Recorder
7 
8 import rospy
9 from std_msgs.msg import String
10 import base64
11 import logging
12 import time
13 
14 logging.basicConfig(filename='listener.log', format='[%(asctime)s] %(message)s\n\n',
15  level=logging.ERROR)
16 
17 def main():
18  '''Main function. Listens all time and publishes converted in string
19  raw audio
20  '''
21  #set listening parameter
22  min_rms=500
23  if rospy.has_param('pyaudio'):
24  pyaudio_config = rospy.get_param('pyaudio')
25  else:
26  pyaudio_config = {
27  'format': 8,
28  'channels': 1,
29  'rate': 16000,
30  'frames_per_buffer': 1024
31  },
32 
33  audio_recorder = Recorder(min_rms=min_rms, pyaudio_config=pyaudio_config)
34 
35  publisher = rospy.Publisher('audio_capture', String, queue_size=1)
36  rospy.init_node('listener')
37 
38  print('start listen')
39  while True:
40 
41  #if sound detected record raw data until silence
42  if rospy.has_param('min_rms'):
43  min_rms = rospy.get_param('min_rms')
44  audio_recorder.set_min_rms(min_rms)
45  raw_audio = audio_recorder.listen()
46  if raw_audio is not None:
47  str_raw_audio = base64.b64encode(raw_audio).decode('utf-8')
48  publisher.publish(str_raw_audio)
49 
50  time.sleep(0.1)
51 
52 if __name__ == '__main__':
53  main()
